description: Infinity Foods is a workers' cooperative based on the south coast of England, specializing in organic and natural whole foods, as well as ethical products. Founded in 1971, the cooperative aims to provide high-quality, affordable food while fostering strong relationships with suppliers and customers. With a commitment to ethical sourcing and sustainability, Infinity Foods prioritizes community engagement and employee welfare, ensuring that all members have a vested interest in the business's success.
name: Infinity Foods
